channel.title: Rains on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Rains on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: Tlaloc
item.description: After a couple unusually warm weeks here in CDMX, looks like the monsoons have finally made their way here! Poured on the way back from work. Wet to the bones and absolutely loved it!
